text: Egha a uaghan notɨn amadaghan itir nguibar mɨghsɨabar itibar atriviba bagha akam amada, egha Jordanɨn Faner zarir sautɨn amadaghan, Galilin Dɨpar Akarer mɨriamɨn itir atriviba bagha akam amada. Egha notɨn itir mɨghsɨar dozibar nguibabar atriviba bagha akam amaga, Dorɨn nguibamɨn boroghɨn ongarir mɨriamɨn itir atriviba bagha akam amada.
